children.text: The benchtop has been installed with a step, which looks poorly finished and needs to be rectified.
The Victorian Building Authority’s Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 10.08 Gaps associated with internal fixing states that

‘Bench tops of timber, laminate, natural stone or similar materials are defective if within six months of handover they have joints that are not uniform, close-fitted, aligned and in the same plane’ .
The benchtop in this area should be rectified or replaced in accordance with above.
